pages.text: haneulgwa saesbyeol-eul dugo maengsehasa
saesbyeol-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudae ege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geugeos-eun bichnaneun byeol-ila
modeun ingan-egeneun geuleul gamsiha neun jaga issnani
geuga mueos-eulobuteo changjodoeeoss neunji saeng-gagke hala
tteol-eojineun han bang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulo changjodoemyeo
geu jeong-aeg-eun deungppyeowa neuggol sai eseo naoneun geos-ila
ileohdeus hananim-eun geu ingan-eul buhwalke hasil su iss-eusimyeo
sumgyeojin modeun geosdeul-i myeongbaegha ge deuleonaneun geunal
ingan-eun amuleon himdo geuligoguwonjado eobsnola
bileul bonaeneun haneul-eul dugo maengsehasa
sigmul-eul ssagteuge haneun daejileuldugo maengsehanani
sillo igeos-eun seon-ag-eul gubyeolhaneun malsseum-eulo
nongdam-eul wihan geos-i anila
eummohaneun geudeul-ege
naega bangchaeg-eul sewi dueoss-euni
jamsi bulsinjadeul-eul geudaelo dula eolmahue geudeul-eul beolhalila
gajang wie gyesineun junim-ui ileum-eul chanmihala
geubun-eun ingan-eul changjohasa gajang-aleumdaun hyeongsang-eulo jieusyeoss-eumyeo
modeun geos-e teugjing-eul dusa geugeos eulo yuyongke hayeoss-eumyeo
geubun-eun mogcholeul saengseongke hasigo
geugeos-eul galsaeg-ui maleun pullo ha sidoda
hananim-i geudaeege malsseum-eul gyesihani amgihayeo ij-ji malla
geuleona hananim-i wonhaneun geos-eunje-oela sillo geubun-eun issneun geosgwa sumgyeojin modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila
hananim-eun geugeos-i geudaeege swibdolog hayeo jueoss-euni
geu gyohun-eul jeondalhayeo deudneun ja deul-ege yuighadolog hala
hananim-eul dulyeowo haneun jadeul eun geu gyohun-eul bad-adeul-il geos-imyeo
bulhaenghan bulsinjadeul-eun geugeos-eul hoepihani
keun buljiog-eulo deul-eoga
geugos-eseo jugjido anihago saljido moshalila
geuleona seuseuloleul cheong-gyeolke han ja beonseonghalini
junim-ui ileum-eul chanmihago gi dohala
